title: [美國戰線]We The Hongkongers 遭FB及網軍惡意打壓 屏蔽大量帖文及阻礙普查運動眾籌

replies.msg:
美國人口普查：我係香港人眾籌:
https://www.gofundme.com/f/us-2020-census-write-in-hongkonger

We The Hongkongers
58 mins ·
We The Hongkongers於今早得知大量分享本組織及Frances Hui 許穎婷發佈的宣傳短片、單張圖片及眾籌連結的帖文均被刪除，據稱內容違反了Facebook的社群守則有關濫用發佈的條款。據本組織了解，Facebook網站今早出現漏洞，屏蔽大量帖文，更有指大部分針對有關武漢肺炎的帖文。

We The Hongkongers對此表示關注，並會繼續監視Facebook的情況。本組織希望我們發佈的內容之所以被刪除，與政治審查無關。

We The Hongkongers至二月以來便積極籌備“Write in Hongkonger”活動，宣揚香港人的身份認同及加強香港人在美國普查的代表性。我們懇請各位香港人繼續分享我們的文宣，並支持我們的眾籌，幫助我們的普查運動運作：https://www.gofundme.com/f/us-2020-census-write-in-hongkonger

–––––––––––––––––––
It has been brought to our attention that Facebook has deleted the shared posts of our promotional video, leaflets, and GoFundMe link on both “We The Hongkongers” and Frances Hui’s Facebook page. We were informed that the shared posts violated Facebook’s Community Standard on Spam.

Numerous other posts, many of them about the coronavirus, have also been taken down, reportedly due to a bug in the anti-spam system.

“We The Hongkongers” is aware of the situation and will continue to monitor Facebook’s response to the issue. We hope the deletion of our posts is not intended as political censorship.

“We The Hongkongers” has been working on the “Write in Hongkonger” campaign since late February 2020 to promote the identity of Hongkongers and representation in the United States. We hope every Hongkonger to continue sharing our videos and posts and support us by donating to our GoFundMe campaign:
https://www.gofundme.com/f/us-2020-census-write-in-hongkonger

–––––––––––––––––––
Facebook: fb.me/wethehongkongers
Instagram: instagram.com/wethehongkongers
Twitter: https://twitter.com/We_the_Hkers
Website: www.wethehongkongers.org

Frances hui有開眾籌


⋯⋯毫不忌諱咁插入廣告：我們需要一些資金去營運是次運動。首先，我們會在主要的社交媒體如Google、Facebook及YouTube上登廣告，亦會在社區中心、餐廳等港人聚首的地方宣傳。此外，籌得款項會用於印刷宣傳單張和海報，以及製作有關本會的紀念商品。美國普查局在三月已經寄出指引，普查即將陸續開始。因此我們希望能盡快籌得款項，及早籌備活動。

眾籌連結：https://www.gofundme.com/f/us-2020-census-write-in-hongkonger
